duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform tire repairs, wheel balancing, and tire changes in compliance with company standards.
Conduct basic vehicle inspections, oil changes, lubrications, and elemental mechanical tasks following standard procedures.
Unload and load items from trucks, maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the service center, and comply with safety policies and federal/state OSHA requirements.
Drive vehicles, interact with team members and managers, and perform other duties as assigned.
Work in a physically demanding environment, lifting and maneuvering items up to 100 pounds. Exposed to various chemicals, hot/cold work environment, and slippery substances.

education_certification.credential: Reading and writing proficiency. Valid automobile driver’s license required at all times.
